医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
研究突出了停止老年患者抗凝剂的风险根据巴斯大学的新发现，对于心房颤动的患者，停止抗凝剂的中风或心脏病发作的风险通常超过出血的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250218/study-highlights-risks-risks-of-stopping-topping-anticalagulants-inger-inderer-patients.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250218/study-highlights-risks-risks-of-stopping-stopping-inationagulants-in grod-nolder-patients.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=43b35343-5052-42fc-ac45-fd9b8b8b0f39bb Tue, 18 Feb 2025 14:30:35 -0500 Study highlights risks of stopping anticoagulants in older patients
SWRI开发了跟踪脑细胞开发的计算方法西南研究所（SWRI）领导的团队开发了一种计算方法，以改善随着时间的推移跟踪脑细胞发育的技术。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250218/swri-develops-computations-method-method-to-track-brain-cell-cell-cell-developments-san-antonio-e28093-feb-18.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250218/swri-develops-computations-method-method-to-track-brain-cell-cell-cell-development-san-antonio-e28093-feb-18.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5b27b713-b5e9-4411-aa08-62401f827661 Tue, 18 Feb 2025 14:17:00 -0500 SwRI develops computational method to track brain cell development
美国心脏协会启动了CKM综合征预防健康计划美国已选择了五个地区来实施一项新的预防健康计划，以改善患有一系列慢性病患者的护理，称为心血管 - 基德尼代谢（CKM）综合征。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250218/american-hend-hend-shert-association-launches-preventive-health-intiatiative-for-ckm-syndrome.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250218/american-hend-hend-shert-association-launches-preventive-health-realthientiative-for-ckm-syndrome.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=989a4f0b-5cf0-454b-9a53-9204616c4142 Tue, 18 Feb 2025 14:11:24 -0500 American Heart Association launches preventive health initiative for CKM syndrome
新评论阐明了阿尔茨海默氏症与代谢综合征之间的联系阿尔茨海默氏病（AD）是痴呆症的最常见形式，仍然是现代医学最大的挑战之一。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250218/new-review-sheds-light-on-ling-on-links-betne--alzheimers-and-alzheimers-and-metabolic-syndrome.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250218/new-review-sheds-light-on-link-on-links-bets-betne-alzheimers-andalzheimers-and-metabolic-syndrome.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2460b665-fa26-4bb4bb4-b690-f071d7e99995b Tue, 18 Feb 2025 14:06:32 -0500 New review sheds light on links between Alzheimer's and metabolic syndrome
塞溶剂剂ABT-263减轻辐射暴露后的胃肠道癌风险Aging（Aging-US）于2025年1月8日发表了一份新的研究论文，该论文在第17卷，第1期，标题为“鼻溶剂ABT-263减轻了APC1638N/+的低辐射诱导的胃肠道癌的低辐射诱导的胃肠癌的发展老鼠。” https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250218/senolytic-agent-agent-abt-263-mitigates-gi-cancer-cancer-risk-fer-fer-fer-fer-fer-fer-fer-fer-radiation-penter.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250218/senolytic-agent-agent-abt-263-mitigates-gi-cancer-cancer-risk-fter-fer-fer-fer-fer-fer-fer-fer-radiation-penter.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=20E5BAA9-037D-4FD7-91B1-952FC3335C348 Tue, 18 Feb 2025 13:54:20 -0500 Senolytic agent ABT-263 mitigates GI cancer risk after radiation exposure
真菌成分可以防止与流感相关的肺损伤一项新研究显示，在所有真菌中发现的成分可能会为与流感相关的肺损伤提供盾牌。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250218/fungal-component-may-protect-against-against-flu-与lung-damage.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250218/fungal-component-may-protect-against-against-flu-2-lun-lung-damage.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=28260E53-CEC1-4F21-BB67-984921EDED4E Tue, 18 Feb 2025 13:45:33 -0500 Fungal component may protect against flu-related lung damage
FDA批准的骨质疏松药物可能治疗罕见的遗传心脏病亚利桑那大学医学院科学家共同领导的研究小组 - 图森发现，骨质疏松药物可能会抵消一种心脏病的罕见基因突变。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250218/fda-approved-osteoporisos-prosis-drug-may-warre-------------------------------------------------------- https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250218/fda-approved-osteoporisos-prosis-drug-may-warre--------------------------------------------------------- https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=df4594da-2c5a-4281-912c-14628b7b1278 Tue, 18 Feb 2025 13:34:36 -0500 FDA-approved osteoporosis drug may treat rare genetic heart disease
结合社交媒体帖子和基于变压器的学习模型，以检测日本的中风风险中风会带来重大的健康风险，尤其是在极端温度条件下。随着气候变化引起的全球温度升高，热浪的频率和严重程度也增加了，使弱势群体面临更大的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250218/combining-social-media-posts-and-posts-and-transformer-learning-models-to-to to-to-detect-Heat-Heat-Heat-stroke-stroke-stroke-stroke-stroke-stroke-stroke-clisks-in-japan.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250218/combining-social-media-posts-posts-and-transformer-learning-models-models-to to-deTect-Heat-Heat-Heat-stroke-stroke-stroke-stroke-stroke-clisks-in-japan.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0A1B8755-11D8-45E6-B7F4-E5BE93B9D8A5 Tue, 18 Feb 2025 13:11:43 -0500 Combining social media posts and transformer-based learning models to detect heat stroke risks in Japan
研究人员将MLC1识别为多发性硬化症的潜在靶标多发性硬化症（MS）是由免疫系统引起的中枢神经系统的慢性炎症疾病。 B细胞是一种白细胞，在MS的发展中起作用，因此是治疗的靶标。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250218/researchers-indiseify-mlc1-as-as-potential-target-target-in-multiple-sclerosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250218/researchers-isendify-mlc1-as-as-potential-target-target-in-multiple-sclerosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f64dd1A7-09A9-4E0A-86A-86A3-AA6884F5A97B Tue, 18 Feb 2025 13:04:33 -0500 Researchers identify MLC1 as potential target in multiple sclerosis
新的评论地图生殖激素对神经健康的影响麦吉尔大学神经病学系和神经外科部的主要神经内分泌学家Hyman M. Schipper今天发表的全面综述在脑医学上发表了一项综合评论，绘制了生殖激素对神经健康和疾病的广泛影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250218/New-review-maps-the-impact-of-reproductive-hormones-on-neurological-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250218/new-review-maps-the--impact-the-impact-of--preproductive-hormones-on-neurological-health-health health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f0392216-836f-4769-979a-01fc89f1e042 Tue, 18 Feb 2025 12:53:21 -0500 New review maps the impact of reproductive hormones on neurological health
